docker.commands.composeUp.label: default
docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose ${configurationFile} up -d

docker.commands.composeUp.label: default - rebuild
docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose ${configurationFile} up -d --build

docker.commands.composeUp.label: mysql-rspec
docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -f mrt-services/mysql-rspec.yml up -d

docker.commands.composeUp.label: local merritt
docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/local.yml up -d

docker.commands.composeUp.label: local merritt + UI
docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/ui.yml -f mrt-services/local.yml up -d

docker.commands.composeUp.label: local merritt -- rebuild
docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/local.yml up -d --build

docker.commands.composeUp.label: local merritt + UI -- rebuild
docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/ui.yml -f mrt-services/local.yml up -d --build

docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/docker-dev.yml -f mrt-services/ui.yml up -d

docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/docker-dev.yml  up -d --build

docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml  up -d --build

docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml  -f mrt-services/debug-inventory.yml up -d

docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml  -f mrt-services/debug-storage.yml up -d

docker.commands.composeUp.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/local.yml -f mrt-services/debug-storage.yml up -d

docker.commands.composeDown.label: merritt + opensearch
docker.commands.composeDown.template: docker compose -p merritt -f mrt-services/docker-compose.yml -f mrt-services/opensearch.yml down --volume

docker.commands.attach.label: list mysql processes
docker.commands.attach.template: docker exec -it db-container mysql -u user --password=password --database=db-name -e 'show processlist; '

containers.commands.attach.label: list mysql processes
containers.commands.attach.template: docker exec -it db-container mysql -u user --password=password --database=db-name -e 'show processlist; '
